select p.title, p.pimg, p.price, p.btime, p.bprice , p.halin, p.pcode , g.writeday, g.su ,g.jumuncode, g.state, g.sangp, g.no from gumae as g inner join product as p on g.pcode=p.pcode and userid=#{userid} order by g.jumuncode desc

mapper.select: select r.* , p.title as ptitle from review as r inner join product as p on r.pcode=p.pcode where userid=#{userid}
